message:
SYSTEM: MGPGLD-v3.pdf: Página 10
RDF - Example
10
http://urjc.es/Alberto
http://urjc.es/Antonio
http://urjc.es/Idafen
“Alberto Fernández”
hasName
hasColleague
hasColleague
“Male”
•
For practical purposes, specially if handwritten, URIs are shortened using XML namespaces
•
xmlns:urjc=“http://urjc.es/”
•
urjc:Alberto is equivalent to http://urjc.es/Alberto
•
RDF serializations: XML, N3, N-Triple
urjc:Alberto
urjc:Antonio
urjc:Idafen
“Alberto Fernández”
person:hasName
person:hasColleague
person:hasColleague
“Male”
person:hasSex
hasSex
